thread.title: Japanese firm hails London ‘electric car’ capital (Greater London Authority)
thread.title_full: Japanese firm hails London ‘electric car’ capital (Greater London Authority) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Japanese firm hails London ‘electric car’ capital (Greater London Authority)
text: ( Source : Greater London Authority ) The Mayor of London Boris Johnson 's drive to make London the low emission capital of Europe has helped position the UK as one of the world's most important markets for car makers developing green vehicles.
